prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a jellyfish-like appearance and striking blue hues.
Imagine a creature resembling Tentacruel, featuring long tentacles and vibrant colors.
Show me an aquatic Pokemon that has a unique blend of blue and red colors.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the characteristics of a jellyfish, with accent colors and flowing tentacles.
Design a Pokemon inspired by deep-sea creatures, focusing on a mesmerizing blue palette.
Make a Pokemon that looks like it belongs in the ocean, with distinctive features and a striking appearance.
Give me an underwater Pokemon with a captivating design that includes tentacles and bright colors.
